So great I am. Thumbs up for me!
Make good habits and they will make you.
Take every step to become a better me!
Relax yourself and get rid of pressure before sleep. Inner peace is the key to a sound sleep.

To sleep for 7-9 hours at night is considered as reasonable. Too less sleep may cause low immunity of body and slow respondence of brain; while too much sleep may make you even more tired and unhealthy.
"It's advisable that one should go to bed before 10:00 PM. Staying up late may reduce immunity and accelerate aging."
Early to bed and early to rise make you healthy
Too much sleep will make you feel tired. Raise the habit to get up soon when you get enough sleep, and not take further sleep any more.
Too much sleep is not good for you
Get avoid of strong tea and coffee before sleep. These may cause frequent urination and excitement that disturb your sleep.
Are you ready for the new week?

What kind of exercise is efficient? First, the exercise intensity should be high enough（heart rate reaches fat burning zone). Second, exercise time should be long enough (more than 20 minutes of fat burning exercise).
在%s的过程中，请确保手环和手机保持在5米的范围内，并且中间不要隔墙，以确保标注成功。
"手环与app连接断开，标注失败，请确保手环 与app在5米以内，且不隔墙,再次开始标注"
Outstanding long-distance runners can run at 180 spm, and we suggest that use 180 strides/min as a exercise goal.
